summary: Henry John Heinz III  was an American politician from Pennsylvania and the great-grandson of the founder of H. J.
full_text: Henry John Heinz III  was an American politician from Pennsylvania. A Republican, Heinz served in the United States House of Representatives from 1971 to 1977, and in the United States Senate from 1977 until he was killed in a plane crash in Lower Merion Township, Pennsylvania in 1991.
title: H. John Heinz III
